title: Poga훾ar Wingman Ayuso Leaves Tour de France Under COVID Cloud
content:
Reported COVID positive for precocious helper Ayuso deals race leader Poga훾ar and UAE Team Emirates blow in fight for race victory; crash victim Powless fights on with wrist fracture.

Read the full article at Poga훾ar Wingman Ayuso Leaves Tour de France Under COVID Cloud on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
